snippet.title: Million Dark Depth Trailer / 2D Action Roguelike Game by CyberSpaceBiotop - PC Switch Eng JP 2024
snippet.description:
Hundreds of years have passed since the earth's surface became uninhabitable. Humans were divided into two factions, either returning to the earth's underground or flying into space.

"Moma" the main character who grew up in a small spaceship and "Kimi" who is said to be at 1,000,000th floors underground. They had a long exchange of messages and they felt that they were supportive of each other.

However, one day, Moma lost contact with Kimi. Being worried, Moma rushes to the Earth to to find out what happened to Kimi and the other underground habitats.

Depending on the different choices that you make throughout the course of the game, there are multiple endings that can be unlocked. 
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
